mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Schedule (scheduleNo, scheduleName, scheduleMemo, startDate, endDate, eventColor, courseNo, userNo) VALUES( seq_schedule_no.nextval, #{scheduleName}, #{scheduleMemo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{eventColor}, 1, 6 )
